params._identifier: Unique device identifier, such as fingerprint of RSA/ECC public key or Ethereum address (recommended).
params._metadataHash: Merkle root hash of metadata (recommended) or simple hash of concatenated metadata.

createDevice(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32).notice: Creates and saves device into storage. Emits DeviceCreated.
